original_title: Alvin and the Chipettes in Cinderella Cinderella
overview: The Chipettes take center stage in a hilarious retelling of the classic Cinderella story! Additional adventures include the hair-raising detective chase “Alvie’s Angels” and Chipettes mischief like you’ve never seen in “The Brunch Club.” Enjoy over an hour of music and laughter starring the Chipettes, and, of course Alvin, Simon and Theodore!
title: Alvin and the Chipettes in Cinderella Cinderella
